short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert temperature and time between oven and air fryer. It also converts temperature between Fahrenheit and Celsius.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Main functionalities: 
- convert temperature and time settings between oven and air fryer 
- convert temperature between Fahrenheit and Celsius

This Chrome extension helps you to quickly get the adjusted temperature and time for air fryer or conventional oven, when the recipe that you are browsing only mentions the cooking temperature and time for either oven or air fryer. The reason is that air fryer and oven have slightly different settings of cooking temperature and time even for the same recipe.

Besides, you can use this Chrome extension to convert the temperature between Fahrenheit and Celsius. The conversion result will be shown at the bottom of the interface.
